attributes.action: meet the Dalai Lama when he comes to the UK in May.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is noticeable that the Prime Minister is keen to meet leaders of contrieswhere human rights abuses take place such as China or Saudi Arabia but not the leader of a country that preaces peace.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
